assets/isaac_sim_diagrams/README.title: Isaac Sim Diagrams
assets/isaac_sim_diagrams/README.description: This directory contains diagrams for NVIDIA Isaac Sim architecture, perception, and navigation from Chapters 6-7.

assets/simulation_diagrams/README.title: Simulation Diagrams
assets/simulation_diagrams/README.description: This directory contains diagrams and visual aids for robot simulation concepts covered in Chapters 4-5.

intro.title: Welcome to Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics
intro.description: Welcome to this comprehensive guide on Physical AI and Humanoid Robotics! This book will take you from foundational concepts to building advanced robotic systems that can perceive, reason, and act in the physical world.
